column4: whats the recommend method of getting java to work (in firefox)?  google searches come back with mixed responses
drinsolitol, if its like chrome, about:plugins
firefox wasn't able to find the plugin
Package sun-java6-plugin is not available, but is referred to by another package.
any idea where to go from here?
You need to add respostory, I think it's multiverse . System -> Administration -> Software sources
software sources isn't an option under system > administration
Humm... well, you can do it from the command line. Let me see.....
And then do sudo apt-get update ; sudo apt-get install sun-java6-plugin
mind if we do a DCC chat?
